meanings.definition: The state or quality of not being ripe.
meanings.sent1: The unripeness of the fruit made it hard to eat.
meanings.sent2: The unripeness of the banana was evident from its green color.
meanings.sent3: The unripeness of the avocado led to a disappointing guacamole.
meanings.sent4: Her unripeness in decision-making showed her lack of experience.
meanings.sent5: The unripeness of the tomato made it taste sour and unpleasant.

meanings.sent1: The unripeness of his skills hindered his promotion.
meanings.sent2: The unripeness of the project caused delays in its completion.
meanings.sent3: The unripeness of the plan left everyone in a state of confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her unripeness in handling responsibilities was noticeable.
meanings.sent5: The unripeness of his behavior showed his immaturity.
